## Simulations

```{r random_seed}
# set the seed for random simulations
set.seed(42)
```

```{r sample_generation}
# get a sample of 1000 exponentials with lambda = 0.2
lambda <- 0.2
exp_sample <- rexp(1000, lambda)
```

A sample of 1000 random exponentials is taken with $\lambda = 0.2$.
